thread.section_title: Hotel Daunou Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel -
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Hotel Daunou Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Vahid T
title: Great Hotel -
text:
Its very convenient hotel. Quick and easy check in and check out. Located in opera area which means you have easy access to Louvre museum, Eiffel tower, Champs-Élysées, etc. Very comfortable, quiet, clean and nice rooms with safe box, TV and nespresso maker machine. you can have everyday room service. friendly, respectful and supportive staffs. great breakfast with many choices.
Certainly one of the best choices to stay in Paris and enjoy the trip.
